languages.text: "Предоставьте людям каюты и найдите чем им заняться на корабле — они теперь часть экипажа".
"Provide them with cabins and put them to work. They are part of the crew from now on."
languages.original_text: "Предоставьте людям каюты и найдите чем им заняться на корабле — они теперь часть экипажа".

traits.locale_text: "Provide people with cabins and tasks to do. They are a part of the crew from now."
"Provide people with cabins and tasks to do. They are a part of the crew from now."
"Provide people with cabins and assign them tasks to do. They are part of the crew from now on."
"Provide people with cabins and assign them tasks to do. They are part of the crew from now on."
"Provide them with cabins and put them to work. They are part of the crew from now on."

languages.text: “给这些人提供住所，分配工作。从现在开始，他们就是我们的船员了。”
languages.original_text: "Provide them with cabins and put them to work. They are part of the crew from now on."

traits.locale_text: “给这些人提供住所，分配工作。从现在开始，他们就是我们的船员了。”

languages.text: « Mettez des cabines à leur disposition et confiez-leur du travail. Ces personnes font désormais partie de l'équipage. »
languages.original_text: "Provide people with cabins and assign them tasks to do. They are part of the crew from now on."

traits.locale_text: « Mettez des cabines à leur disposition et confiez-leur du travail. Ces personnes font désormais partie de l'équipage. »

languages.text: "Stellt den Überlebenden Kabinen zur Verfügung und weist ihnen Aufgaben zu. Ab jetzt sind sie Teil der Crew."
languages.original_text: "Provide people with cabins and assign them tasks to do. They are part of the crew from now on."

traits.locale_text: "Stellt den Überlebenden Kabinen zur Verfügung und weist ihnen Aufgaben zu. Ab jetzt sind sie Teil der Crew."

languages.text: «Proporcióneles camarotes y póngalos a trabajar. Desde ahora forman parte de la tripulación».
languages.original_text: "Provide them with cabins and put them to work. They are part of the crew from now on."

traits.locale_text: «Proporcióneles camarotes y póngalos a trabajar. Desde ahora forman parte de la tripulación».

languages.text: 「彼らにキャビンを提供し、働かせろ。あいつらもクルーの一員だ。」
languages.original_text: "Provide them with cabins and put them to work. They are part of the crew from now on."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らにキャビンを提供し、働かせろ。あいつらもクルーの一員だ。」
